page.title: 11RECREATION AND ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: Gardening is very popular. Other activities include sports such as tennis, swimming, horse-riding, cycling, golf, motorcycling, netball, karate and walking. Other interests include oilpainting, photography and local history. Some of these activities are sponsored by the WEA. In the evenings many families watch TV, attend local societies or visit the local pubs. There are many horticultural festivals held in the area, the largest being in Basildon. It features Morris dancing and jousting. For the past two years a{Fun Water Event}has been held on the Thames at Pangbourne. Many remember{The Silver Jubilee {(1977).}There was a barrel race from the Beehive Pub to the Town Hall and a men v women football match. The day ended with a barbecue and barn dance.
